languages.text: {n}Стоящий рядом с техножрецом сервитор смотрит на вас искоса. И резко отводит взгляд, поняв, что замечен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Стоящий рядом с техножрецом сервитор смотрит на вас искоса. И резко отводит взгляд, поняв, что замечен.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоящий рядом с техножрецом сервитор смотрит на вас искоса. И резко отводит взгляд, поняв, что замечен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. Then quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}
{n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. Then quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}
{n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. Then quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}
{n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. Then quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}
{n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}
{n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le servitor se tenant près de lui vous lance un regard en biais avant de détourner rapidement les yeux dès qu'il réalise que vous l'avez remarqué.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor se tenant près de lui vous lance un regard en biais avant de détourner rapidement les yeux dès qu'il réalise que vous l'avez remarqué.{/n}

languages.text: {n}站在他旁边的机仆正在偷偷地看你。当他意识到你注意到他时，他迅速移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}站在他旁边的奴工正在偷偷地看你。当他意识到你注意到他时，他迅速移开了视线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor, der neben ihm steht, mustert dich verstohlen. Als er bemerkt, dass es dir aufgefallen ist, blickt er eilig weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor, der neben ihm steht, mustert dich verstohlen. Als er bemerkt, dass es dir aufgefallen ist, blickt er eilig weg.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El servidor que lo acompaña te examina de soslayo. De repente, mira a otro lado al darse cuenta de que lo has visto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor que lo acompaña te examina de soslayo. De repente, mira a otro lado al darse cuenta de que lo has visto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼の隣に立っているサーヴィターは、こちらをさりげなく観察している。こちらが見ていることに気づくと、サッと目をそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の隣に立っているサーヴィターは、こちらをさりげなく観察している。こちらが見ていることに気づくと、サッと目をそらした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yanında duran hizmetör, bir taraftan seni inceliyor. Fark ettiğini anlayınca da hemen gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor standing next to him is examining you obliquely. It quickly looks away upon realising that you have noticed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yanında duran servitör, bir taraftan seni inceliyor. Fark ettiğini anlayıncaysa hemen gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n}
